imdb.plot outline: The story is of Zoha, who has came with her father and grandfather in rent house owned by Mr. Nazim but they haven't payed 3 months rent bill. This lets to Nazim's son Kazim to go up and ask but every time he scares from Jabir, Zoya's father because he is Inspector. Jabir's father (Zoya's grandfather) asks them to change their phases which will led Kazim to fear more. Once, he comes in form of spider man, when her parents ask her she says that spider man had came and her grandfather searches in Google 'spider man' and thinks he is whom Zoha loves but she says that he is Kazim. Zoha brings false birthday cake for Kazim but he rubs it on her face. She makes false video on him saying emotionalism of Zoha.
imdb.title: Mohabbat.pk
plot: The story is of Zoha, who has came with her father and grandfather in rent house owned by Mr. Nazim but they haven't payed 3 months rent bill. This lets to Nazim's son Kazim to go up and ask but every time he scares from Jabir, Zoya's father because he is Inspector. Jabir's father (Zoya's grandfather) asks them to change their phases which will led Kazim to fear more. Once, he comes in form of spider man, when her parents ask her she says that spider man had came and her grandfather searches in Google 'spider man' and thinks he is whom Zoha loves but she says that he is Kazim. Zoha brings false birthday cake for Kazim but he rubs it on her face. She makes false video on him saying emotionalism of Zoha.::Mustafa Afridi
